trigger.name: Asterisk Restarted on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Asterisk has been restarted during last 5 minutes

trigger.name: CPIUIOWait high on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: CPU usage and IOWait too high

trigger.name: Disk space extremely low on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Available disk space is less than 2 GB

trigger.name: Disk space Low on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Available Disk space is less than 5 GB

trigger.name: RAM extremely low on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Free RAM is less than 10 MB

trigger.name: Trunk gone offline on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: One or more trunk gone offline
